subject: winter snow day in the Maine countryside makes me want to go for a long walk with the dog

parts.part1: Winter hits Maine and suddenly the countryside transforms into a snow-covered wonderland. Your dog's at the window, tail wagging, begging for adventure.
parts.part2: Don't let winter keep you inside. Grab those boots, leash up your best friend, and discover the magic waiting outside your door.
parts.fullScript:
Winter hits Maine and suddenly the countryside transforms into a snow-covered wonderland. Your dog's at the window, tail wagging, begging for adventure.

Don't let winter keep you inside. Grab those boots, leash up your best friend, and discover the magic waiting outside your door.
